CustomField.description: Hyperlink to the level 1 Taxonomy for this record.
CustomField.formula: IF (NOT(ISBLANK( Parent_Id__r.Parent_Id__r.Parent_Id__c)), HYPERLINK("/"+ Parent_Id__r.Parent_Id__r.Id,Parent_Id__r.Parent_Id__r.Name), IF (NOT(ISBLANK( Parent_Id__r.Parent_Id__c)), HYPERLINK("/"+ Parent_Id__r.Id,Parent_Id__r.Name), ""))
CustomField.label: Level 1
